comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Great worldcup promo ASIANCONNECT, but is this a bitcointalk challenge or open to all that needs players to go to your site?

Hello Woodie! Thank you for the feedback. This is open to everyone¬† You can check out this link https://www.correctscorechallenge.com/

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: You don't have an Announcement Thread here yet, it would be better if you made one but your gambling website must have crypto payments like Bitcoin because this is a forum about cryptocurrencies, so it doesn't make sense if there is a gambling website that doesn't have crypto payment options but announce the service hereIs this free entry or do players have to make a bet on your website to be able to follow it?
